prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with a body resembling a vibrant orb and sharp wings.
Imagine a dark-colored creature with a spherical core and imposing spiked features.
Show me a legendary Pokemon that combines red and black colors with a unique dragon design.
Design a Pokemon with a robust body shape and intimidating presence, perfect for battle.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the elements of dragon and dark types, featuring striking colors.
Generate an image of a powerful dragon Pokemon with a round midsection and elongated wings.
Give me a mythical creature with a balance of strength and elegance, represented in deep colors.
